meanings.sent1: After drinking soda quickly, he eructates loudly.
meanings.sent2: She eructates after every meal, which can be embarrassing.
meanings.sent3: The baby eructates during family dinners, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old car eructates smoke as it struggles up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The volcano eructates ash and lava, creating a spectacular sight.

meanings.definition: The act of belching or burping
meanings.sent1: His eructates were so loud that they echoed in the room.
meanings.sent2: The sudden eructates during the meeting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The eructates of the cartoon character added a comical touch to the scene.
meanings.sent4: The eructates of the old building revealed its age and history.
meanings.sent5: The eructates of the machine signaled a malfunction that needed fixing.
